short_description: Quick-absorbing moisture cream for dry to very dry facial skin; enriched with urea and lactate to bind moisture and smooth rough skin.
text: Eucerin UreaRepair Day Face Cream is a quickly absorbing moisturizer for everyday dry to very dry skin that is prone to flaking and a feeling of tension. Enriched with urea and lactate, it provides immediate moisture, preserves skin moisture, and smoothes rough skin; also suitable as a make-up base and for psoriasis and aging skin.

short_description: Body lotion with 5% urea + ceramides for intensive 48h moisturisation and barrier strengthening.
text: The formula with 5% Urea intensively moisturizes and softens skin; natural moisturizers improve water-binding and ceramides strengthen the skin's protective barrier — delivering intensive 48H moisture and smoother skin.

short_description: Concentrated formula combining 2% salicylic acid and Thiamidol to treat blemishes, post-acne marks and comedones.
text: This concentrated formula combines 2% Salicylic Acid (BHA) and patented Thiamidol; clinically proven to correct three main imperfections: blemishes, post-acne marks and comedones.

product_name: Q10 Active Day Cream (for dry skin)
short_description: Anti-ageing facial cream for sensitive, dry skin containing Q10 to re-energise skin cells and reduce oxidative stress signs.
text: Eucerin Q10 Day Care re-energises and revives skin for a younger, fresher look. Contains coenzyme Q10 and vitamins C and E to counteract oxidative stress and smooth fine lines; formulated for sensitive skin and free of artificial fragrance, colour, parabens and alcohol.

short_description: Multi-purpose repairing ointment for very dry, irritated or cracked skin — protective, moisturising and suited for small damaged areas.
text: Eucerin Aquaphor Repairing Ointment is for dry, cracked or irritated skin; it soothes and protects small damaged skin areas, and is used for chapped lips, cracked hands, and other localised skin damage.

short_description: Night cream with high and low molecular hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate skin and reduce deep wrinkles.
text: Eucerin Hyaluron-Filler Night Cream combines high and low molecular hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate skin and reduce the appearance of deep wrinkles while you sleep; enriched with Saponin to stimulate skin's own hyaluronic acid production.
